title: Senior Police Officers including SDIG Ajith Rohana transferred
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police said that several senior police officers were transferred based on service requirements.
– Senior DIG Ajith Rohana: Transferred as the Senior DIG in charge of the Southern Province from the Crimes and Traffic Division.
– Senior DIG M. D. R. S. Daminda: Transferred as the Senior DIG in charge of the Eastern Province from the Southern Province
– Acting DIG L. K. W. K. Silva: Transferred as the DIG in charge of the Crimes and Traffic Division from the Eastern Province
